title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description:
Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details has the following issues:

a. The name validation is duplicated on the first page.
b. The first and second column should be merged.
c. The buttons are too small.
d. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.
e. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
f. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
OB:
a. The buttons are too small.
b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled.
c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off.
d. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
